Description: An identifier (preferably unique) for the record within the data set or collection.
Why or How the species is in this area - see IUCN Codes
The full scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified.
Which resource was primarility used to obtain georeference - eg Google earth
Maximum altitude if a range has been given
Is or Was the species in this area - see IUCN Codes tab
build from genus and specific epithet
Individuals or institutions responsible for providing the map data for the Red List assessment to IUCN. This field is used for the overall map citation
Yes, if point data is sensitive
What is the seasonal presence of the species in the area - see IUCN Codes tab
